org.vadere.util.io

Class IOUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vadere.util.io.IOUtils

  • public class IOUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains utilities for input and output.

        title - title of the dialog
        subdir - subdirectory of the user.dir
        Returns:
        the path chosen by the user
